Dating: 3RD INTERMEDIATE PERIOD (not before); LATE PERIOD (not after)
Name: Faience shabti
Description: A crudely fashioned, deep blue glazed faience shabti, with details in black. The figure carries two hoes and has a square basket on it's back. The wig is decorated with a simple seshed-headband knotted at the back. The text is in a single column on the front of the figure, without borders.
